overview: This portrait of East German sculptor and graphic artist Fritz Cremer (1906-1993) shows the artist at work in his studio and some of his art works, including sculptures for his Buchenwald Memorial. It accompanies the images with a text by Bertolt Brecht, read by actor Wolfgang Heinz of the Deutsches Theater in Berlin.

production_companies.name: VEB DEFA Studio für Wochenschau und Dokumentarfilme

title: Fritz Cremer, Creator of the Buchenwald Memorial
